```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(ggplot2, tidyverse)

df <- read.csv("firstdata_download.csv")

```

```{r}
mean(df$Age)
mean(df$Men..Rot)
sum(df$Gender == "F")
sum(df$Gender == "M")

df$Age <- as.numeric(df$Age)
df$Men..Rot <- as.numeric(df$Men..Rot)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df) + 
  geom_bar(aes(Gender, fill = "Gender"))

```
